name: Nimaasus the Implacable
rules: 3, Flip Nimaasus -> Numaasus deals X holy damage to target ally, where X is the amount of damage that ally dealt to Nimaasus this turn.

name: Varanis Bitterstar
rules: 4, Flip Varanis Bitterstar -> Varanis deals 2 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Draw a card. Use only on your turn.

name: Through the Dark Portal
rules: During your turn, pay 13 to complete this quest.;Reward: Remove your deck and graveyard from the game. Build a new ten-card deck using cards from your entire collection.
